name: Natural: Avoid Batch Programs using WHERE statement in Read operation
description: This diagnostic will make a count of the number of WHERE clauses and compare these to the number of Select statements. The WHERE word is a keyword for Natural.
rationale: The WHERE clause is causing Natural to perform the search, whilst it is faster to have Adabas perform the search
remediation: Try to find alternative to WHERE clause

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - Memory, Network and Disk Space Management
